name: UserStyles.org Dark Redesign
description:
Version 0.3.2
2008-08-13

Inspired by style 6403.
All graphics used are original.

This style revamps UserStyles.org with a cool dark tone. It covers the main page, the forums, and the blog. It supports resolutions as low as 800x600. To change this style to fixed-width, find "/*width: 1234px !important;*/" (near the top) and remove the "/*" and "*/" tags and change "1234" to the desired width in pixels. This doesn't work well as a percentage.

More screenshots:
Discussion, after http://img98.imageshack.us/img98/1971/discussct2.png
Blog, after http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/9339/bloggem3.png

Don't forget to check out my other UserStyles.org style, style 9559!

Please leave any questions, comments, suggestions and bug reports to help make this a better style.
